TopicTitle: DragonForge Tech Presents: Dragon Force 100T+ Express Lifter.

Articles.Content:
Okay, so you got yourself some cargo but suddenly realize that you can't make that window of opportunity.

Your in luck, we here at DFT have developed a new launch system for just such a need, I present:

Weighting in at 1000 tons (ironic) this massive behemoth will keep true to its namesake with a t/w ratio of greater then 1! (Cases specific, see manual for more information, manual sold separately, limited stock, consult your doctor before use.)

DFT is proud to be the lead designer of express delivery systems at discount prices.

Costs: 400.000 Spacebucks.

Edited September 9, 2015 by TimePeriod

.craft file pls?

How do I craft file?

O.o
Go to a file sharing website, then upload the .craft file which can be found in your save file.
I personally upload it to my google docs, then you can get a link to put up from there, VERY easy
